name: APHRC Microdata Portal
description: A web-based platform publishing metadata, documentation, and qualitative and quantitative datasets from research studies by the APHRC (African Population and Health Research Center). Datasets are freely available to partners, researchers, academicians, and post-graduate students for theses-related works in formats such as Stata and SPSS. Access requires registration and request, with datasets available at no cost after approval. Data covers various topics from socio-demographic to health, education, and others, primarily from African countries.
owner_name: African Population and Health Research Center (APHRC)
